noClientsYet: You don't have any clients added yet
noClientsYetExplanation: To add a client, click the button at the bottom.
sendFormToCustomerDescription: Send an information form to the customer so they can fill out the information you need. A sample form link is provided below.
noResultsDescription: We couldn't find any clients matching your search or filter criteria. Try adjusting the filters or modifying the search query to find the desired results.
activeCustomerStatusExplanation: Active customers are fully engaged in the system and any operations related to them can be performed.
inactiveCustomerStatusExplanation: Inactive customers are temporarily unavailable in the system, and no operations can be performed with them.
pendingCustomerStatusExplanation: Pending customers are in a transitional state where an information form has been sent to them but has not yet been completed or approved.
